thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-8X8 Q3 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.02 Excluding Items

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-8X8 Q3 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.02 Excluding Items
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - 8X8 Inc:
* 8X8, INC. REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q3 REVENUE $75.6 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $73.9 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.96 * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUE IN RANGE OF $293 MILLION TO $294 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $293.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
